name: Don Tomas - Special Edition Connecticut - No. 300
additionalNotes: Don Tomas S.E. Connecticut cigars are distinguished by their silky, smooth-smoking U.S.-grown Connecticut Shade wrappers. Inside is a rich blend of Dominican, Mexican and Nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos for a creamy, toasty, mild to medium-bodied smoke with a marvelous aroma. This bestselling blend is also a great way to introduce yourself to the Don Tom√°s family of fine premium cigars.
